message: Sei shifts his gentle gaze.

name: セイ
message: "You've protected Aoba this whole time, haven't you?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yes."

name: セイ
message: "And Aoba accepted you. As a separate being, as your own person."

name: セイ
message: "Then perhaps it's time to accept him, too."

name: セイ
message: "You and he are the same. And he has suffered for so long. You must free him. Forgive him."
Him? Who are they talking about?

name: セイ
message: "Aoba. You know that Ren was originally just one facet of your mind?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: セイ
message: "Ren was born to protect you and keep your mind in balance. What do you think he was protecting you from? Keeping the balance against?"
Not knowing how to answer, I turn to look at Ren.
He's staring at Sei.

name: セイ
message: "Ren wasn't the only personality existing separate inside you. I think you know what I mean."

name: セイ
message: "I believe you've heard his voice, even seen him. He is the other you."
The other me...
The part of me to whom Scrap truly belongs.

name: セイ
message: "Ren's original purpose was to protect you from him, to prevent him from erasing you and taking over."

name: セイ
message: "But he's not your enemy. He's not a bad person. And he doesn't want to erase you."

name: セイ
message: "Isn't that right... Aoba?"
Sei looks over his shoulder. There stands another me, though I can't say when he appeared.
Like Sei, this me has white skin and white hair. Is that what I looked like when I was born?

name: セイ
message: "Aoba, Ren bared his soul to you, and you accepted him. Won't you give him the same chance?"
Sei pushes the other me forward. He stares at me, motionless, his expression blank.
Sei takes one step back.
And that's when I notice something strange.
I can see through Sei's legs, as if he were fading away.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Your body..."

name: セイ
message: "My wish will be granted soon. You will destroy me and set me free. You don't need to worry about me anymore."

name: セイ
message: "My last piece of unfinished business... is him. But I'm sure he'll be fine. After all, you accepted Ren."

name: セイ
message: "Aoba, it might surprise you to hear this... but I don't hate Toue."

name: セイ
message: "No one knows for certain what is right and what is wrong. Each person must decide that for himself."

name: セイ
message: "It's true that I've suffered. My life has been hard... but how I feel about Toue, about what he did... that, only I can decide."

name: セイ
message: "You, too, must decide for yourself. Listen, see, try to understand every side. There's never just one point of view."

name: セイ
message: "The answer you choose, that you feel is right... That will be everything to you."
Sei's body continues to fade.
He reaches out to touch my cheek. I can barely make out the contours of his hand.

name: セイ
message: "I may not hate Toue, but I will make sure this ends. It's not as if I don't bear some responsibility for the situation."

name: セイ
message: "I will gather the pieces of myself, and together, we will destroy this tower... and Platinum Jail."

name: セイ
message: "I can't destroy like you can, of course... but I'll give it my best shot."
Sei flashes me another gentle smile.

name: セイ
message: "Now, Aoba. Destroy me. Set me free. I can't finish this until you do."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No... No!"

name: セイ
message: "Aoba..."
Sei frowns just a little, and his vanishing hands softly clasp mine.

name: セイ
message: "Look into my eyes."

name: セイ
message: "Aoba."
Sei continues with a hint of sadness in his voice.

name: セイ
message: "Please... give me peace. Use your power... to set me free."
Gathering my resolve, I slowly meet Sei's gaze.
His eyes gleam with a gentle light. I feel like I could lose myself in their depths.
Holding his gaze, I part my trembling lips.
To save Sei...
To save my brother...
...I need to destroy him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll... destroy you."
There's a blinding flash. And when it fades...
Sei has pulled away. He's smiling, his body almost entirely gone.

name: セイ
message: "I'm so glad I got the chance to talk to you at the end. Thank you, Aoba. Thank you."
And then...
...Sei fades into nothing.
For a while, I just stand there, staring at the place where he was.
Sei is gone. I know what that means. Oh, I know.
And yet, no tears come.
Instead...
A lump rises in my throat. I swallow, but it won't go away.
It just... hurts so much.
